channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bottom half of road sign on A4019 Tewkesbury Road, Cheltenham defaced with blue graffiti (paint), 27th February
item.description:
Green-backed distance (mileage) sign on westbound carriageway of A4019 Tewkesbury Road, Cheltenham – a few yards from Gateway Retail Park (Currys etc) and on opposite side of dual carriageway from M&S Food. What3Words location = bleak.sleep.funds. Seen on Tue 27th Feb 2024. Note that the photos attached are from Google Street View and pre-date the graffiti.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Five potholes scattered along northern section of Andover Street, Cheltenham, 27th February
item.description:
There a five potholes, getting deeper quite quickly, in the northern section of ANDOVER STREET between Andover Road and Suffolk Road. They are along the middle section of the road. The potholes start where the good surface ends outside the former Cleveley Garage premises, now flats, and continue northwards..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Andover Street, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rusted jagged pipe sticking out of pavement, 27th February
item.description:
Near towards sixways crossing near inner pavement crossing. Have had to stop 2 young children leaping on rusted metal pipe

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 239b, London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked water drain, 27th February
item.description:
Drain near lamp post with number 57 on it. When it rains the water has nowhere to go as drain is full/blocked. It has been like this for about 1 year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott Walk, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The lights are causing a huge back up of traffic in Cleeve direction, 27th February
item.description:
Roadworks by new development stoke road The lights are not sensitive to traffic and caused over a 2 mile tailback in one direction. Emergency access will be impacted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Pothole level with central reservation on junction of Telstar Way and A40, 27th February
item.description:
There's a pothole in the middle of the A40, level with the central reservation on the junction with Telstar Way. All of the traffic turning right out of Telstar Way is hitting it, and it's getting bigger by the day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Telstar Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road, 27th February
item.description:
WHAT ARE YOU DOING ABOUT THIS ROAD. The whole section from crickley park to this point is disgusting. It’s so dangerous and damaging to cars. The whole carriage way needs resurfacing. Stop with these pathetic temporary repairs and fix the road properly. It’s too narrow, fast and dangerous and you’re failing at maintaining this road safely
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 107, Carter Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Multiple potholes with loose gravel risk to cyclists, 27th February
item.description:
Within the Birch Close cul-de-sac area, there are multiple potholes which are larger than 300 mm and deeper than a golf ball with lots of surface gravel posing a loose surface risk to cyclists and motorists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Birch Close, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on pavement side of road, 27th February
item.description:
Large pothole on pavement side of very small bridge. Cars avoiding this causing more issues with oncoming traffic. Accident likely if not fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pls prioritise Hillview Rd and Wessex Drive for resurfacing, 27th February
item.description:
The road on Hillview Road & Wessex Drive is deteriorating badly and breaking up in many places. As a result there is lots of gravel on it and in many places it is a patchwork of previous repairs. It really needs resurfacing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Wessex Drive, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes / uneven road surfaces, 27th February
item.description:
All the way up this road there are numerous potholes, uneven road surfaces - especially at St Georges Road end and at the junction of Parabola Road - the whole area needs looking at or resurfacing as this is a heavily used stretch of road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least 3 bad potholes on Hillview Road near Priors Road junction, 27th February
item.description:
There are at least 3 bad potholes on Hillview Road close to the junction with Priors Road. I have attached photos of the 3 worst ones.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hill View Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
